products.name: DeLonghi EC155 Espresso Machine
products.description: 15-bar manual espresso and cappuccino machine with dual filter holder for ground coffee or pods. Features steam wand for milk frothing, 1-liter removable water tank, and cup warmer. Compact design with 1100-watt heating element.

products.name: Breville Barista Express
products.description: All-in-one espresso machine with integrated conical burr grinder, 15-bar pump, PID temperature control, and steam wand. Grinds and brews fresh espresso in under a minute with precise extraction.

products.name: Mr. Coffee Espresso and Cappuccino Machine
products.description: Programmable espresso and cappuccino maker with 15-bar pump pressure system and automatic milk frother. Brews single or double shots for espresso, cappuccino, and lattes. Stainless steel construction with one-touch controls.

products.name: De'Longhi ECP3120 15 Bar Espresso Machine
products.description: 15-bar espresso machine with advanced cappuccino system for milk frothing. Supports ground coffee and ESE pods. Features hot water tap, steam wand, and cup warming surface.

products.name: Nespresso Essenza Mini by De'Longhi
products.description: Ultra-compact espresso machine with 19-bar pressure pump, rapid heat-up, and dual programmable buttons for espresso and lungo. Nespresso capsule-compatible with automatic brewing and crema extraction.

products.name: Nespresso Inissia Espresso Machine Bundle
products.description: Compact espresso machine with 19-bar pressure extraction and 25-second preheating. Includes Aeroccino milk frother for hot or cold milk frothing. One-touch operation with programmable buttons for espresso and lungo. Auto power-off and automatic volume control.

products.name: Nespresso Vertuo Next with Aeroccino Frother
products.description: Compact coffee and espresso maker with Centrifusion technology, four programmable cup sizes from espresso to mug, 30-second heat-up, and included Aeroccino milk frother for hot or cold milk.

products.name: Calphalon Temp iQ Espresso Machine
products.description: 15-bar pump espresso machine with steam wand for milk frothing. Dual thermoblock technology for simultaneous brewing and steaming. Includes milk pitcher, tamper, and cleaning accessories. Professional results with semi-automatic operation.

products.name: Breville Infuser Espresso Machine
products.description: 15-bar pump espresso machine with precise temperature control, low pressure pre-infusion, and volumetric shot control. Includes stainless steel milk frother and pressure gauge for consistent extractions.

products.name: EspressoWorks All In One Barista Bundle
products.description: Complete 7-piece espresso machine set with built-in milk frother, grinder, 2 cups, frothing pitcher, and tamper. 15-bar pump, 45-second heat-up, stainless steel construction for home use.

products.name: STARESSO Portable Espresso Maker
products.description: Manually operated espresso maker with 15-18 bar pressure. Compatible with Nespresso capsules and ground coffee. Compact 80ml capacity, produces rich crema. Perfect for travel, camping, and outdoor use. No electricity required.

products.name: De'Longhi Stilosa Manual Espresso Machine
products.description: Compact 15-bar pump espresso maker for single/double shots, lattes, and cappuccinos. Includes manual milk frother steam wand, dual filter basket, and tamper. Stainless steel boiler and elegant design.

products.name: Philips 3200 Series LatteGo Espresso Machine
products.description: Fully automatic espresso machine with ceramic grinder and intuitive touch display. LatteGo milk frother creates silky foam in under 10 seconds. Brews espresso, coffee, americano, and milk-based drinks. AquaClean filter reduces descaling.

products.name: WACACO Minipresso GR
products.description: Lightweight portable espresso maker (360g) for ground coffee. Manual piston operation requires no electricity. Produces up to 50ml authentic espresso anywhere. Includes built-in cup and scoop.

products.name: Capresso 303.01 4-Cup Espresso and Cappuccino Machine
products.description: Compact steam-driven espresso machine with swivel frother for cappuccinos and lattes. Brews 2-4 cups in under 5 minutes with dual coffee/steam selector for customizable strength. Includes glass carafe and measuring scoop.

products.name: Mr. Coffee One-Touch CoffeeHouse+ Espresso Maker
products.description: One-touch espresso maker with automatic milk frother for cappuccinos and lattes. 19-bar Italian pump, single/double shot options, 18oz milk reservoir. Makes cafe-quality drinks at home.

products.name: Nespresso CitiZ Original
products.description: Compact espresso machine with 19-bar pressure for espresso and lungo drinks. 25-second heat-up, programmable buttons, includes milk frother. Sleek black design for any kitchen.

products.name: Gaggia Brera Super-Automatic
products.description: Compact super-automatic espresso machine with integrated ceramic burr grinder. Brews espresso, lungo, cappuccino, and lattes. Features pannarello wand, three brew strengths, five grind sizes, and programmable cup settings. 40oz water reservoir.

products.name: Mixpresso Espresso Machine
products.description: Single-serve espresso maker compatible with Nespresso capsules. Features 19-bar Italian pump for barista-quality extraction, 27oz water tank, and one-touch programmable buttons. Compact 1400W design brews in seconds.

products.name: Philips 3200 Series LatteGo Espresso Machine
products.description: Fully automatic espresso machine with integrated ceramic grinder and LatteGo milk frother. Creates lattes, cappuccinos, and iced coffee with customizable strength and volume. AquaClean filter reduces descaling needs. Simple two-part milk system cleans in seconds.

products.name: Nespresso Lattissima Pro Espresso Machine
products.description: Nespresso capsule espresso machine with automatic milk frother for cappuccinos and lattes. Features 19-bar pump, touchscreen display, and automatic milk clean function. Makes 6 drink varieties.

products.name: Breville Barista Touch
products.description: Integrated espresso machine with conical burr grinder, touchscreen display, and automatic milk texturing. ThermoJet heating reaches optimal temperature in 3 seconds. 54mm portafilter, PID temperature control, 15 bar Italian pump for rich extraction.

products.name: Chefman 6-in-1 Espresso Machine
products.description: 15-BAR pump espresso machine with built-in milk frother for cappuccinos and lattes. One-touch single/double shot, 1.8L water reservoir, stainless steel construction, dishwasher-safe parts.

products.name: Nespresso VertuoPlus Espresso Machine
products.description: Single-serve espresso and coffee maker using Centrifusion technology. Brews 4 cup sizes from espresso to coffee. Features motorized brewing head, automatic capsule ejection, 40 oz water tank, and capsule barcode recognition.

products.name: WACACO Nanopresso Portable Espresso Maker
products.description: Manual espresso maker delivering 18 bar pressure without electricity. Compact design (0.74 lbs) for travel and camping. Brews single shots with finely ground coffee. Includes water tank, espresso cup, portafilter, and accessories.

products.name: WACACO Minipresso NS
products.description: Portable manual espresso machine compatible with Nespresso capsules. Compact, lightweight design requires no electricity. Press-operated mechanism delivers up to 45ml espresso using pre-measured capsules. Ideal for travel, camping, and office use.

products.name: Flair Espresso Maker Classic with Pressure Kit
products.description: Manual lever espresso machine producing cafe-quality espresso with 6-9 BAR pressure. Includes pressure gauge, two portafilters, tamper, and carrying case. All-manual, no electricity required.

products.name: EspressoWorks Espresso Machine 10-Piece Set
products.description: 19-bar espresso machine with 1250W heating, built-in grinder, milk frother for lattes and cappuccinos. Includes dual shot baskets, cups, tamper, and accessories for complete home barista setup.

products.name: Gaggia Classic Evo Pro
products.description: Italian-made espresso machine with 9-bar pump, 58mm commercial portafilter, dual shot baskets, and pressurized basket. Professional steam wand for microfoam. Three-way solenoid valve, updated boiler resists scale.
